name: places/ChIJ_6VUJP1YwokRkyOwrhW8ytk
formattedAddress: 145 E 49th St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 145 E 49th St, New York, NY 10017, USA

editorialSummary.text: Unfussy suites with kitchens in a relaxed hotel offering complimentary breakfast & Wi-Fi.

originalText.text: Great base to explore the city from.  Staff are friendly and very helpful.  Rooms are a little tired, could do with a refresh but huge and ideal for families.  Noisy at times at night which is to be expected in New York.  Breakfast was a bit of a free for all.  Very small area for amount of people staying in the hotel.  You're lucky to get a table at breakfast, but you are allowed to take it back to your room if need be, although expect to wait ages for the lift to get you there!  We gave up the one morning and bought breakfast elsewhere as you couldn't get anywhere near the food area.  Get down there early if you want a table and to be able to get near the food.  Otherwise a great stay.

text.text: Great base to explore the city from.  Staff are friendly and very helpful.  Rooms are a little tired, could do with a refresh but huge and ideal for families. You're lucky to get a table at breakfast, but you are allowed to take it back to your room if need be, although expect to wait ages for the lift to get you there!  We gave up the one morning and bought breakfast elsewhere as you couldn't get anywhere near the food area.  Get down there early if you want a table and to be able to get near the food.  Otherwise a great stay.

originalText.text: Friendly staff, can't do enough to help you,  always smiling and helpful. The desk is manned 24/7 which is fab. Breakfast was good every morning 7-10am with a selection of cereals, yogurts, fresh pastries, waffles, pancakes, toast, eggs, sausage and mini potatoes, fresh fruit is available and the coffee/tea machine is available 24/7 and is free.  I recommend the hot chocolate with hot milk ☺️ delicious. Apartment was much much bigger than we expected and clean and tidy and the beds are so comfy. Location is very close to shops and subways too. Hermes in particular on reception was so helpful and friendly, I wished I could pop him in my pocket and bring this amazingly kind gentleman home with me ☺️ very nice place.

originalText.text:
LOVED this place.  We had a 2 bedroom suite. It was nice to have the space! Very clean.  Comfortable.  Doug, Ashley, and ROSIE!  So amazing!! Kitchen (Rosie) was always well stocked and probably the best run kitchen I've ever seen at a hotel. Location was about a 20 minute walk from Times Square, which made it nice and quiet.

Area has some nice restaurants and a few right there (Italian, Pizza, Kosher).

Would highly recommend for anyone!!

originalText.text:
Such a clean, friendly place to stay. Very convenient location - we walked everywhere! Not fancy, but that keeps the price down. It’s everything you need.
Great for our group of 5 adults!

text.text:
Such a clean, friendly place to stay. Very convenient location - we walked everywhere! Not fancy, but that keeps the price down. It’s everything you need.
Great for our group of 5 adults!

originalText.text: Had a wonderful stay here for our first time in NYC. The one bedroom penthouse suite was exactly what we were looking for and more. Probably the biggest private terrace in NYC and the full kitchen was great. Rooms were very clean and spacious. Free breakfast downstairs included eggs, potatoes, and freshly made pastries delivered every day. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Location was great for a first visit with the subway just right around the corner and Times Square, Central Park, and Grand Central Station all within a 20 minute walk.
